text: Filippo Antonio Pasquale de' Paoli 6 April 1725 â€“ 5 February 1807 was a Corsican patriot, statesman, and military leader who was at the forefront of resistance movements against the Genoese and later French rule over the island. He became the President of Corsica. Category:1725 births Category:1807 deaths Category:Politicians from Corsica
title: Pasquale Paoli
